articles.author: Emma Jacobs
articles.title: Would you survive 378 days of team bonding? Nasa takes the test - Financial Times
articles.description: Lengthy simulation of life on Mars illuminates the universal features of work, including petty irritations with colleagues
articles.content:
Could you spend 378 days and nights in a darkened space, illuminated only by strip lighting and a window looking out on a fake planet, with just three colleagues for company? A week? OK, a night?
Th… [+3514 chars]

articles.author: Chris McPherson
articles.title: Alec Baldwin's 'Rust' Trial Gets a Shocking Update - Collider
articles.description: Alec Baldwin's involuntary manslaughter charge for the death of Halyna Hutchins on the set of Ruse, was dismissed in the middle of the trial.
articles.content:
The Big Picture
  • Alec Baldwin's manslaughter case dismissed in a surprise decision.
  • The judge rules case cannot be reopened, bringing an unexpected end to the legal proceedings.

articles.title: First Descendant dev promises to make changes after Destiny 2 ‘plagiarism’ accusations - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: Nexon says it has “a deep affection and respect for other games in the genre”…
articles.content:
Nexon has said it will change in-game icons in its shooter The First Descendant, after it was accused of plagiarising art from Destiny 2.
